PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2012-03912012-04-05,  ,  ,  HRSDC, 
ActCanada Student Financial Assistance Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Canada Student Financial Assistance Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the CANADA STUDENT FINANCIAL ASSISTANCE REGULATIONS in order to ensure that students targeted for grants continue to be eligible for the non-repayable assistance they need to pursue post-secondary education, by updating the Low- and Middle-Income Thresholds used to determine eligibility taking into account inflation.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2012-0079 Publication Date: 2012-04-25
AttachmentsAttachment
